name: cribl_splunk_forwarder_windows_xml_events_to_json
author: David Maislin
description: This pack is designed to transform Splunk Windows Sysmon/XML events to JSON, reduce event sizes, be compliant with the Splunk Common Information Model (CIM) and maintain backwards compatibility with the Splunk Add-on for Microsoft Windows and the Splunk Common Information Model (CIM)
displayName: Splunk Forwarder Windows XML Events to JSON
